item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, October 23, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump accuses UK Labour party of interference in White House race
2. Trump’s ex-chief of staff says he is a fascist and would govern as a dictator
3. ‘Thousands’ of North Korean troops to fight in Russia
4. Deloitte axes 250 UK employees in performance-related cull
5. Giuliani must turn over New York apartment and watches in defamation case
item.guid: FT Most Read: Wednesday, October 23, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
